item.title: Bash code snippets
item.description: Rename all files by pattern in current directory files=(*) # Loop through all files for file in "${files[@]}" do # Check if the file name contains the "№" symbol if [[ $file == *"№"* ]]; then # Remove everything before and including the "№" symbol new_file=${file##*"№"} mv "$file" "$new_file" echo "Renamed $file to $new_file" fi done
